Usage

Loading a Dataset

import unitxt

dataset = unitxt.load_dataset(['glue', 'stsb'])

Loading a Dataset with Different Format or Instructions

Note

This section is to be determined (TBD).

Loading a Mixture of Datasets

unitxt.load_dataset('glue', source='mixture')
